page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: DELABOLE (NORTH). The village of Delabole falls into two blocks for the Domesday project.{The southern block 02040081 deals with the following topics concerning Delabole and the surrounding farmland: INDUSTRY: Delabole slate Quarry. FARMING. EMPLOYMENT(1). EDUCATION:Delabole C.P. School. RECREATION. HOMELIFE:Cooking & Pets. MEDIA:TV,books &the village newsletter { The northern block}deals with these: LOCAL HISTORY ECOLOGY: Natural history & weather. LANDSCAPE: Coastline,beaches,slate. TOURISM EMPLOYMENT(2). RELIGION HEALTH
